turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I order something from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a Caramel Macchiato, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. 2% milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size do you want to order it in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium or vente? Whatever.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, venti is their largest size did you want that or grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, Thente.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, which location do you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicago State Street Fourth apartment D1.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said state street in chicago right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i'll send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti caramel macchiato with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on state street in chicago.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.
